titleInfo.title: Canal Bank Building (corner of Baronne and Common Streets)

mods.abstract: The camera stands at street level looking back toward the Canal Bank Building. In the foreground pedestrians watch construction work taking place at a site across from the bank building.

titleInfo.title: New Orleans Negative Exposures and Prints, circa 1900-1930

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
